autotransform.batcher package

Submodules

autotransform.batcher.base module

The base class and associated classes for Batcher components.

class autotransform.batcher.base.Batch

Bases: TypedDict

A logical grouping of Items with title and associated metadata.

metadata: typing_extensions.NotRequired[Mapping[str, Any]]
title: str
class autotransform.batcher.base.Batcher(params: autotransform.batcher.base.TParams)

Bases: Generic[autotransform.batcher.base.TParams], abc.ABC

The base for Batcher components. Used by AutoTransform to separate Items in to logical groupings that can be acted on indepently and have associated metadata.

_params

The paramaters that control operation of the Batcher. Should be defined using a TypedDict in subclasses.

Type

TParams

abstract batch(items: Sequence[autotransform.item.base.Item]) → List[autotransform.batcher.base.Batch]

Take filtered Items and separate in to logical groupings with associated group metadata and title.

Parameters

items (Sequence[Item]) – The filtered Items to separate.

Returns

A list of logical groupings of Items with associated group metadata and

title.

Return type

List[Batch]

bundle() → autotransform.batcher.base.BatcherBundle

Generates a JSON encodable bundle. If a component’s params are not JSON encodable this method should be overridden to provide an encodable version.

Returns

The encodable bundle.

Return type

BatcherBundle

abstract static from_data(data: Mapping[str, Any]) → autotransform.batcher.base.Batcher

Produces an instance of the component from decoded params. Implementations should assert that the data provided matches expected types and is valid.

Parameters

data (Mapping[str, Any]) – The JSON decoded params from an encoded bundle.

Returns

An instance of the Batcher.

autotransform.batcher.chunk module

The implementation for the chunk Batcher.

class autotransform.batcher.chunk.ChunkBatcher(params: autotransform.batcher.base.TParams)

Bases: autotransform.batcher.base.Batcher[autotransform.batcher.chunk.ChunkBatcherParams]

A batcher which chunks Items in to several Batches. A chunk size is supplied that determines the size of Batches. A maximum number of chunks can optionally be supplied. If the chunk size would result in more than the maximum number of chunks, the chunk size is increased to the minimum required to create only max_chunks. The title for a batch will have [X/N] prepended to it, where X represents the chunk number and N represents the total number of chunks.

_params

Contains the chunking information along with metadata and title.

Type

ChunkBatcherParams

batch(items: Sequence[autotransform.item.base.Item]) → List[autotransform.batcher.base.Batch]

Take filtered Items and chunk them into Batches.

Parameters

items (Sequence[Item]) – The filtered Items to separate.

Returns

A list of logical groupings of Items with associated group metadata and

title.

Return type

List[Batch]

autotransform.batcher.directory module

The implementation for the directory Batcher.

class autotransform.batcher.directory.DirectoryBatcher(params: autotransform.batcher.base.TParams)

Bases: autotransform.batcher.base.Batcher[autotransform.batcher.directory.DirectoryBatcherParams]

A batcher which separates FileItems by directory. Batches are given a title that is based on a prefix and the directory that the batch is using.

_params

Contains the prefix to use for constructing a title.

Type

DirectoryBatcherParams

batch(items: Sequence[autotransform.item.base.Item]) → List[autotransform.batcher.base.Batch]

Takes in a list FileItems and separates them based on their directory.

Parameters

items (Sequence[Item]) – The filtered Items to separate.

Returns

A list containing a batch for each folder containing files.

Return type

List[Batch]

autotransform.batcher.factory module

A simple factory for producing Batchers from type and param information.

class autotransform.batcher.factory.BatcherFactory

Bases: object

The factory class for Batchers. Maps a type to a Batcher.

_map

A mapping from BatcherType to the from_data function of the appropriate Batcher.

Type

Dict[BatcherType, Callable[[Mapping[str, Any]], Batcher]]

static get(bundle: autotransform.batcher.base.BatcherBundle) → autotransform.batcher.base.Batcher

Simple get method using the _map attribute.

Parameters

bundle (BatcherBundle) – The bundled Batcher type and params.

Returns

An instance of the associated Batcher.

Return type

Batcher

Bases: autotransform.batcher.base.Batcher[autotransform.batcher.single.SingleBatcherParams]

autotransform.batcher.type module

The type of Batcher, used create a 1:1 mapping.

class autotransform.batcher.type.BatcherType(value)

Bases: str, enum.Enum

A simple enum for 1:1 Batcher to type mapping.

CHUNK = 'chunk'
DIRECTORY = 'directory'
SINGLE = 'single'

Module contents

Batchers take filtered Items and separate them in to logical groupings with associated metadata that can be acted on independently.
